name: MyRVM
0:
”Alexa Ask my rvm what is my meal plan balance”
”Alexa ask my rvm what is today's news”
”Alexa ask my rvm what is the mail status”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.

Developer Terms of Use
des: Residents in the community can request various forms of community information such as news, events and mail status.
